issue.title: [CF 1151] Need help detecting with Rune of power procs
issue.body:
This is more of a use case issue.

On my mage,  I am trying to get notification when a Rune of power procs on the floor.    I feel TMW has to be able to detect when it procs, but I can't figure out how to get an icon tied to that event.

I cast frost bolt a few times, then frozen orb.    Eventually it will proc.   A blue circle on the ground.    If I stand in it I get the Rune of power buff,  but I'm trying to get notice of it's presence so I can know to go stand on it.

any help you can offer would be great.

Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user tahamilton64 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1151 | Raw

comments.body:
You can't, unfortunately. I've tried to do this for myself, but there's nothing in the combat log when it spawns, so there is no way to know when it happens.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
